credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Study of Wind in Trees
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
description: Hill with seemingly windswept trees in right middleground. Second hill with windswept trees in left distance. Flat land out to horizon in center, with dramatically cloudy sky. Miscellaneous pen in margin to right of image.
name: Sketchbook folio
